Cougaar 12.7

Uses of Class
org.cougaar.core.mts.Message

Packages that use Message
org.cougaar.core.agent This package contains the Cougaar agent base class and bootstrapping components. 
org.cougaar.core.agent.service   
org.cougaar.core.blackboard This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService. 
org.cougaar.core.mts This package contains the Cougaar support classes required to implement the MessageTransportService, such as MessageAddress. 
org.cougaar.core.mts.singlenode This package contains a single-node MTS implementation, created for performance characterization and MTS overhead computation. 
org.cougaar.core.node This package contains the Cougaar JVM node and node-level services. 
org.cougaar.core.relay This package contains the Cougaar support for "relays", which are generic blackboard objects that transfer data between agents. 
org.cougaar.core.service This package contains the Cougaar primary core service APIs. 
org.cougaar.core.wp This package contains the Cougaar "white pages" naming service. 
org.cougaar.core.wp.resolver   
org.cougaar.lib.web.micro.mts This package contains the Cougaar message-transport-based servlet engine and tunnel. 
org.cougaar.mts.base This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.std This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime.
